extendedInfo.description: ComicRack for Android is the companion for the best eComic Reader and Manager for PCs: ComicRack for WindowsOptimized for phones and tablets it allows you to read your eComics anywhere you want.When used together with ComicRack for Windows it allows automatic synchronization of eComics with your Android device via USB or WiFi, including reading positions, reading lists and bookmarks. Your synchronized eComics will also be converted and optimized so they can be read fast an reliable on your handheld device. And best of all, this way you can read all the formats ComicRack for Windows supports (PDFs and even WebComics). Optionally the eComics can even be size optimized during synchronization which usually makes them half the size without noticeable quality reduction. ComicRack includes a Live Wallpaper that shows random covers from your library. You can even start reading by double tapping the background.ComicRack also includes an App Widget to show your library on your home screen.The paid version removes all the ads and adds wireless synchronization. So you no longer need to connect your device to your PC to get your eComics from ComicRack for Windows. You can even invoke a synchronization directly from your device and your PC will send you all the new eComics from your lists.Before buying please try the free version first and see if it works as expected on your device.After buying, please use your 15 minutes return window to check out if everything works.Short feature list:â¢ Optimized for phones and tabletsâ¢ Reader with single and double page viewingâ¢ Advanced zoom modesâ¢ Auto scrollingâ¢ Right to left reading mode for mangasâ¢ Color adjustmentsâ¢ Automatic page cropping for small devicesâ¢ Full library management with lists and searchingâ¢ Management of reading states (unread, completed, bookmarks etc.)â¢ USB and Wifi synchronization with ComicRack for Windowsâ¢ Reads CBZ and CBR nativelyâ¢ When used together with ComicRack for Windows it supports CBZ, CBR, CB7, CBT, PDF, DJVU and WebComicsâ¢ Live Wallpaperâ¢ App Widgetâ¢ Twitter integrationTroubleshooting:While you can have the free and the paid version installed at the same time, it is best to uninstall the free version.Should you have problems with WiFi follow the tips provided in the FAQ and online documentation.If you experience any bugs it is best to post your problems in the appropriate section of the user forum.Online Resources:Documentation is located athttp://comicrack.cyolito.com/documentation/comicrack-for-androidFAQ is available athttp://comicrack.cyolito.com/faqs/comicrack-androidUser and Support Forum is athttp://comicrack.cyolito.com/forumEven if you have no problems you can join and talk to other ComicRack users.

reviews.title: Easily the best comic management app ever.  Seriously, buy it now.
reviews.comment: Works incredibly well with the desktop application.   Best purchase on the Play store for me thus far.   Thanks a million for such a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: Awesome app, well crafted and works perfectly.
reviews.author: Thimmiy Meuller

reviews.title: Buy
reviews.comment: Awesome, gets better all the time, running on a nook hd, with no issues what so ever favourate app of all time.
reviews.author: Alun Jones

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Amazing app. Would love it even more if page flipping effect enabled. One more thing. I\'m not able to disable the app from auto start up using system tuner pro. Kindly fix this. I don\'t want the app running in background and draining battery.
reviews.author: Roshan Keisham

reviews.title: Great app with some niggles
reviews.comment: As a comic reader it\'s the best on android, but some of the additional features aren\'t perfect, which is annoying in a \302\2435 app. I store my comics on a microSD card which I remove to add new issues. Every time I do the app loses all my ratings, for good. It also takes a while to load whilst reading new issues - could these not be loaded in the background so I can get on with reading existing issues? Also menu screen colour makes menu text illegible on nook hd+.
reviews.author: Stuart Johnson

reviews.title: Best comic app
reviews.comment: This is hands down the best comic app available. I have it on my phone, tablet, and laptop. Worth the money.
reviews.author: Jason White

reviews.title: My favorite app of all time! Highly recommended!
reviews.comment: My favorite app of all time! Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Roman Jr. Cantos

reviews.title: Great for tablets
reviews.comment: I used the free version for probably 3 months and it works great. Figured I\'d buy the full version.
reviews.author: Paul Trebilcox-Ruiz

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: I love this app.
reviews.author: Jake Graves

reviews.title: You won\'t be sorry...
reviews.comment: Well worth the money!  I have it both for Android and iOS. Works beautifully on both.
reviews.author: Brian Cook

reviews.title: Excellent companion to ComicRack for Windows
reviews.comment: I have been a long time user of ComicRack for Windows. So when cYo ported the mobile version to Android it solidified my decision to purchase a tablet. I highly recommend this product. Keep up the great work, cYo.
reviews.author: Eric DeCarlo

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Bad
reviews.author: Sash Blevins

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Now that the right to left issues are fixed, this is probably the best comic and manga reader on Android.
reviews.author: Rola S

reviews.title: The best on the market
reviews.comment: If you love your digital comics, this app is the one you want. Forget about the others. BUY THIS NOW!
reviews.author: John Gaston

reviews.title: License check faill / No support
reviews.comment: I can\'t read anymore. When I try come back to menu for choose another comic I receive this error. Fix this ASAP pls!!!  UPDATE: after this last update I still with the same problem, this app just works offline.   Don\'t spend your money with this app because the developers didn\'t give support!
reviews.author: Nan Mandian

reviews.title: WORKS LIKE BUTTER!
reviews.comment: Really happy now that I\'ve synced my libraries and keep track of reading!    EDIT: Today I just clicked sync on my pc and wirelessly synced with my phone. It works now. Worst customer support ever... but who cares?  Cheers
reviews.author: Avery Navas

reviews.title: A Must-Buy for any true Comic fan.
reviews.comment: I usually buy solid copies of comics, but, like any other human being, I can\'t have them on me anywhere I go, so I started looking for comic book reader apps. Comic-Rack is the absolute best available reader app for the job. It\'s very responsive, and I love the WiFi sync features available between pc and phone- if I download a comic to my pc, within minutes it\'s on my phone too, and it\'s ready to take with me. Excelsior, friends!
reviews.author: Erik Gomez

reviews.title: Error could not install on usb or sdcard?
reviews.comment: Paid for full version n it wont let me install it yet I can install the free version with no problems!? RIPOFF!!!
reviews.author: Mohamed Rodriguez

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Great comic reader. Works smoothly, low battery usage. Seems to have a slight issue opening comics in order at times but others it\'s nearly perfect.
reviews.author: Rusty Jackson

reviews.title: Great App when Free. Now Unable to Open
reviews.comment: I was reading so many comics in this app that it was moral for me to purchase the application.  But once I paid up and started the paid app, it is not starting and says \" Market Verification Failed\". I have a fully working internet connection. ( Tried on Wifi and 3G ) I am unable to use the app completely. :( It is so disappointing. This is one of the costlier apps and this Market check fail is completely disappointing. :(  The App is kick ass. So I cant give a bad rating either. Please fix.
reviews.author: Christin George
